hackathon-description-text: InMobi Hack Day, InMobi’s flagship event is back this Spring from Feb 20-21, 2016. This time the broad themes are Social, Mobile, Analytics and Cloud (SMAC). Taking a clue from success of our previous
hackathon-eligibility:
Only shortlisted teams from the pre-registered teams will be invited to the hack day at InMobi Bangalore office. If you attended the event, then you are eligible to make a submission at DevPost.
Submission window will be open during the 24 hours of the event. You must the build the project during the hack day.
Registration Guidelines:
hackathon-requirements:
- Please submit your submission with the same name as your team name.
- No need to submit the code.
hackathon-rules:
Only shortlisted teams from the pre-registered teams will be invited to the hack day at InMobi Bangalore office. If you attended the event, then you are eligible to make a submission at DevPost.
A detailed schedule and other details of the event will be mailed to the shortlisted teams.
